body.name: Office Chair Ergonomic Mesh Chair High Back Computer Desk Chair with 3D Armrest Adjustable Lumbar Support and Headrest Receling Chair, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 2 hrs 36 mins
features: Free Adjusting Headrest - Do you want to sit all day without any discomfort in your shoulder and neck? This chair for the computer desk is able to substantially reduce the daily pain in the neck and shoulder areas since it comes with an adjustable headrest. It allows you to rotate it to a specific angle and go up/down until you reach a suitable height.

Adjustable 3D Armrest - This contemporary ergonomic office chair with 3D adjustable armrests. They can lift up/down or go forwards and backward about 20° rotation for the best fit to your favorite position. Possessing both, a nice appearance and superior functioning, this high-back mesh office chair is an implementation of technology of the future. Our modern computer chair is the decorative detail that will bring some fun and satisfaction to your office life.

Reclining & Locking Backrest - After long hours of work, study, or gaming sitting in the home office chair, your brain and eyes sometimes need a break. A good ergonomics chair with reclining and a lockable backrest is absolutely a plus for your room. You are able to tilt the back to the angle you want, put on your headphones, close your eyes, and enjoy a really comfortable rest!

Adjustable Lumbar Support - This mesh back office chair has excellent lumbar support for your lower back area. It follows the curve of your lower back good enough to greatly reduce possible spine fatigue. An improved design of a comfy computer chair is undoubtedly the ideal match for people who work or play games on the computer for long hours.

Breathable & Soft Mesh - Preventing you from sweating or heat when sitting for hours, our ergonomic mesh computer chair with mesh fabric design delivers the perfect option to keep full airflow on the head, back and bottom. Moreover, the mesh material that we used to create this tall computer chair is not hard or brittle, but very flexible and skin-friendly.

Straightforward Installation - The Installation instructions and accessories are included in the box. The instructions are easy to understand and follow. And NO extra tools and fittings from your side are required to assemble the mesh seat office chair. Just need no more than 30 minutes for an adult to put it together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: best part is the mesh seat cause you dont sweat up a storm so comfy 10/10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Breaks immediately - causes injuries.
reviews.reviewText: Like the other reviews mentioned, the seat of my chair came a part after 3 weeks. The staples cut my leg up as it happened so quickly I didn’t noticed it came part until I had several lacerations from the staples. I pulled what I could from the chair and used a blanket to fill in the gap but the chair is in even worse shape.The back is became loose like it’s become detached from the base but there no way to tighten it or do anything.Even if these things didn’t happen this chair is problematic- all the adjustments to the arms mean nothing when you can’t adjust to what you want to keep it they way. They are so sensitive a toddler was able to accidentally adjust the arms with no effort. This makes it dangerous because you have no stability if you put a minuscule amount of pressure on the armrests and they readjust on you when you aren’t trying to adjust them.The leaning back adjustment is worthless it’s either locked to not move or unlocked with no wait to lock it in a different position. You can’t use it without falling backwards because if flings you all the way back.I opened a case with the US consumer product safety commission due to the injuries caused by this product and seeing the same issues from other people. This product is not safe! I wish I could get my money back to buy another chair as I work from home and need an office chair.I hope this gets pulled from the shelves soon so no one else gets hurt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Has all the features
reviews.reviewText: Everything moves. It's simply built but does everything you need. I'm very impressed with this chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Excellent packaging, clear instructions, good choice of materials
reviews.reviewText: Just finished setting up the chair. Setup was easy, and it's supremely comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Armrest broke in under two months.
reviews.reviewText: There's no real support for this item, and even though the armrest should be easy to replace with just a screwdriver, there doesn't seem to be any way for me to get replacement parts without buying an entire chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Seat fabric is pulling out of the frame on the seat :-(

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Happy Not Happy
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This chair is so comfortable and gives exactly what is needed ergonomically.However; after less than 3 weeks after putting it together and the seat material is coming apart and I can’t exchange it. The amount of money spent for a quality chair and I’m pretty much screwed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Update: Customer service is non-existent. Stay away from this chair. Huge waste of money.Firstly, I do like the chair, for the price that I paid. It was easy to put together. The mesh features are nice. Keeps me cool. I like the lumbar support as well as the headrest. Overall, this is a really good chair for my home office. That being said, there is an issue with the build quality of the seating surface. I saw another person having the same issue. The mesh seating surface on the right side of the chair is coming out. I have attempted to push it back inside the chair, but it keeps coming out, and only on the right side. Obviously, this happened 30 days after my return window closed. I will attempt to reach out to customer service to see what can be done. I have only had the chair since July of 2022. Very disappointed. I will update this review as needed.

Compré este artículo de 2da mano y aunque la caja venia abierta y maltratada, la silla y todos los componentes estaban en buen estado y completos.La silla es muy cómoda y vale la pena por el precio. La calidad de los materiales es muy buena y resistente. Yo mido 1.63 y me queda super bien en su posición mas baja, tanto la silla en general como para la cabecera.A mi parecer los movimientos y las posiciones ajustables de los descansabrazos y cabecera son muy sensibles pero están ok.Llevo usándola 2-3 semanas pero espero subir update si algo sale mal.
